channel.title: [PI] Pest Control Help!
channel.description:
Hey im having trouble fixing my pest control System.
Heres the problem, when the players get on the boat and start Approaching the portal everything is fine but when they kill a portal for some reason they re appear and that way they cant finish pestcontrol in less than 5 minutes... The portals re appear 5 seconds after they have been Destroyed. Can anyone help me with this? if you have the answer to my problem please dont hesitate to Comment below :)
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Pest Control Help!
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

On my server, The npcs dont have a respawn time. they spawn at the start of the pest control and if they are still alive when the timer runs out the players are teleported back to the boat and all npcs with those ids are then killed. removing the player from pest control… may not want to have them auto spawn from the .cfg file… may want to spawn them at the start of the mini game, makes more sense.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Pest Control Help!
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

I’ve had this problem when I used the HybridPVp source all you do is change the portal respawn time. Go to NpcHandler.java
Search

Under it should be Return ###:
Change the ###'s to the time you want if it says 100 that means 100 seconds 200 is 200 seconds and so on… Goodluck!

Read full topic
